hive_lesson.title: 1312 Skin Sea and Sun
hive_lesson.description: Paul and Amy discuss sunshine and warm and cold climates.

hive_text_custom.text: , do you burn easily in the sun?
: I do! I get really, really
, just turn into one big freckle. I have to be careful not to get burned, yeah. I’m careful with my sun lotion. How about you?
: Yeah, I’m not a sunbather. I can’t think of anything more boring to be quite honest with you. I may not get it lying on the beach – you’ve got the sand, you’ve got the surf.
, but I just get too bored. I’d rather be more active, doing some sort of swimming, some sort of activity….
: I really enjoy swimming in the ocean. If I go to the beach, I don’t sunbathe at all. I sit in the shade until I just want to swim in the ocean: go snorkeling, see something. That’s a lot more fun.
: Mmmm, yeah, see something, explore a bit. Yeah, yeah. I mean the sea creatures are actually fascinating really. You put that snorkel on, it's as if you’ve gone into a new world.
: Speaking of Scandinavia, I did a home stay when I was a high school student.
: Yeah, and it was with a Danish family. And the mother was very kind of typically Scandinavian. Uhm, like stereotypically very  strong, blond hair, and every day of the year
, she would swim in the sea.
: You know there’d big blocks of ice in the sea, and she’d still be swimming.
. I think she really believed that it was good for the circulation and her health. Yes, but admiration, but I won’t want to follow her.
: I don’t think I could - only certain times a year.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1)  Paul thinks lying on the beach is _____ .

hive_text_custom.text: So being fair-skinned, do you burn easily?
If you are fair-skinned, you light colored skin. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
People from Ireland are fair-skinned.
 He likes getting tan to cover his fair-skin.

hive_text_custom.text: A freckly person has lots of freckles. Freckles are small dots on the skin. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
I was quite freckly when I was little.
 I think freckles are cute.

hive_text_custom.text: I’m not a sunbather. I do get it, but I just get too bored.
If you 'get it', then you understand how people feel about something. If you do not get it,' then you do not understand. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
I disagree, but I do get it.
 I just don't get it. Tell the joke one more time.

hive_text_custom.text: Every day of the year without fail, she would swim in the sea.
. It is often used with the word

hive_vocab.examples:
I drink coffee every morning without fail.
 Without fail, she calls her mom every weekend.

hive_text_custom.text: A sturdy lass is a woman who is very tough and strong. Lass means woman. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
My aunt was a sturdy lass.
 My sister is a sturdy lass. She is as tough as any man I know.

hive_text_custom.text: something, you strongly believe in it, and often share you thoughts about it with others. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
My mother swore by the healing power of aloe vera oil.
 He drinks cod liver oil every day for his health. He swears by it.
